methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the map manager, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the map manager from a world context, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: RequestFogOfWarData
methods.comment: Puts a player controller in the transfer queue awaiting fog of war transfer

methods.name: TransferFogOfWarData
methods.comment: Transfers fog of war data via player controller

methods.name: SyncFogOfWarChanges
methods.comment: Receive fog of war data via player controller

methods.name: SetupFogOfWarTexture
methods.comment: Setups the fog of war texture TODO: Move the texture parts to separate class

methods.name: UpdateFogOfWar
methods.comment: Local updates of the fog of war

properties.name: mFogOfWarRawData
properties.comment: The raw pixel data for the fog of war texture. Each element represents a channel for a pixel

properties.name: mFogOfWarDataSize
properties.comment: The size of the raw pixel data array

properties.name: mFogOfWarResolution
properties.comment: The resolution for the fog of war texture

properties.name: mFogOfWarPixelsPerPacket
properties.comment: Number of pixels we will send per packet when we transfer fog of war to clients

properties.name: mFogOfWarNumberOfPackets
properties.comment: Number of packets that will be sent when we transfer fog of war to clients

properties.name: mFogOfWarTexture
properties.comment: The fog of war texture that is used for the map

properties.name: mFogOfWarUpdateTextureRegion
properties.comment: The fog of war texture region used for updating the texture

properties.name: mCachedMinimapCaptureActor
properties.comment: Capture actor used for translate world locations to map locations

properties.name: mLowestWorldLocation
properties.comment: Fog of war config values used for debugging

properties.name: mFogOfWarTransferQueue
properties.comment: Queue to handle clients waiting for fog of war transfer

properties.name: mActorRepresentationManager
properties.comment: Actor representation manager to get representations updates to calculate fog of war data

properties.name: mDynamicFogOfWarRevealActors
properties.comment: The currently active dynamic actor representations that reveal fog of war

properties.name: mDynamicActorsArrayIndex
properties.comment: The current index for the tick update loop for fog of war from dynamic actor representations

properties.name: PIXEL_OFFSET
properties.comment:
The pixel data array contains 4 uint8 per pixel. We only need to change 1 during runtime and the red channel is used in the material.
	So we stick with an offset of 2 for now.
